import React from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { Card, Container, Row, Col, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { ChevronDownIcon } from '@primer/octicons-react' import girl from './girl.png'; function Main() { return ( Tired of boring quizzess all the time?



Use Rhymewit so students learn

through __________ . ) } export default Main;
